using System;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.TryCatch.Input
{
	public partial class VirtualAutoProperty
	{

		public Task<int> TestAsync()
		{
			return Success ? Task.FromResult<int>(1 ): Task.FromResult<int>(0);
		}

		public Task Test2Async()
		{
			try
			{
				Success = true;
				return Task.CompletedTask;
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
			}
		}

		public Task<VirtualAutoProperty> CreateAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				return Task.FromResult<VirtualAutoProperty>(new VirtualAutoProperty { Success = true });
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<VirtualAutoProperty>(ex);
			}
		}
